name: Ashutosh Shashi
aboutMeHeadline: Hi, I'm Ashutosh, an Author, Technology Leader, and co-founder of STEMars EdTech Private Limited.
aboueMeDetails: He completed his master's, Master of Computer Applications in 2004 from Bundelkhand University, Jhansi, India. Before his Master, he did Bachelor in Science in Physics and +2 (Isc) in Science from Langat Singh College (L.S.College), Bihar University, Muzaffarpur, Bihar, India.  He has done several graded and non-graded courses in Entrepreneurship and Management from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT), University of Washington, Arizona State University (ASU), Harvard University, and the University System of Maryland (USM), in the USA. He holds a wide array of certifications in the latest technologies, Software Architecture, Enterprise Architecture, and Project Management.
